data.title: True Directional Movement - Modernized Third Person Gameplay
data.meta_description: Overhauls the third person gameplay similarly to modern action RPGs, entirely through SKSE. Move and attack in any direction. Includes a custom target lock component and an animated target reticle wid
data.text: Action Based Projectiles - Dodgeable Range Attacks Not required but ABP is built around its aim support. addon for TK dodge RE - stagger dodging when target lock fix ADXP I MCO Skyrim Martial Arts - Kick Boxing Recommend ADXP I MCO Nordic BattleAxe Warhammer Animation(Outdate) Recommend ADXP I MCO Skyrim Martial Arts - Taekwondo(WTF) Precision ADXP I MCO AC Valhalla Nordic Animation Reworked SCAR 0.85 patched(OutDated) Recommend ADXP I MCO I BFCO Xianghua SC6 Remastered (SCAR) Soft. Easy target locking for spell casting. ADXP I MCO Nordic Dagger Animation(Outdate) Recommend ADXP I MCO Nordic GreatSword Animation(Outdate) Recommend ADXP I MCO Nordic Mace Animation For Player Recommend ADXP I MCO Nordic Sword Animation(Outdate) Recommend ADXP I MCO Nordic WarAxe Animation For Player Recommend ADXP l MCO Nordic Animation Complete Pack Recommend ADXP l MCO Desert Race Animation Complete Pack Recommend ADXP l MCO Imperium Animation Complete Pack Recommend Aetheos' Immersive SmoothCam Preset Soft requirement, needed for the camera to track the player. Animated Wings Ultimate (NO FLY) Slow Flap Glide soft requirement? untested Animation Event Logger Optional, for selecting/logging other NPC's Ascendant Stances Combat MCO 0.9 The Directional Attacks (dTry's Key Utils) won't work without it Better SmoothCam Preset (optional, has superior lock on system that goes well with the preset) Bow Charge Plus This is only required if you are using Dodge Shot. Bully My Squire - ADXP MCO - Elden Rim - Sublime Moveset Not a hard requirement, but without it you will get bullied instead Carry Your Carcasses With Animation Not must, but highly recommended Combat Eyes OPTIONAL, but highly recommended. Conditional JL Parkour Jump Animations - CATA Addon for Freerun in Skyrim Contextual Crosshair optional Custom Control Map For TK Dodge RE -OCPA-TDM-Spell HotKey-Wheeler-Valhalla Combat And all it's requirements Elden Rim - Weapon Arts 3.3.4 must 必装，重要前置 Elder Creed - Movement (Deprecated) Elder Creed - Movement II Engarde - True Directional Movement Patch Fast Paced Cinematic Smooth Cam Preset Soft Requirement - Not needed but trust me you want it Female running and walking animation SE Need to turn on 360 degree movement First Person Target Locking Fix Freerun in Skyrim - Acrobatic Jump Replacer Optional for old DAR version below 1.3 Gamepad Controlmap Edited for SoulsyHUD and Elden Ring Power Attack Not required but created in mind to use with this mod. Genshin Xbox Controller Remap for Wheeler ADXP DMCO TDM BTPS DAK (Recommended)See description. Glenmoril Boss TDM patch Glide Soft requirement. For extra mid-air controls. God of War 2018 HUD Get the main file (soft requirement, only for the boss bars) GV's TrueHUD Boss Bar Integration for various Quest and New Lands Mods Horizon Zero Dawn SmoothCam Preset Soft Requirement - Not needed but trust me you want it Immersive First Person View(IFPV) Preset Optional (for Head Tracking in 1st person view) INI File for Improved Camera compatibility with True Directional Movement lock-on system needed for the target lock-on features properly working with Improved Camera Judgement Cut End - ap05's Remake PI DAR Nemesis MCO If you use Nemesis' head tracking, There is a bug where the upper body leans to look back while JCE motion is playing. Kyneticist - MCO mage gameplay Highly recommended for the lock on feature, and in general Lens Control Map For the lock on feature Lizard-like swiming animation for argonians Magical Jumping - Air Dash - Air Attack - Slam Attack Highly recommended for free movement. Modern Controller Layout for DS4Windows (with Optional Sexlab Support) Modern Third Person Controller Controls For Lock-On Myriad - A Smoothcam Preset for RPG Classes Not required but highly recommended Percy's Preset - Smoothcam Preset a soft preset, but an awesome mod for the 3rd person camera PS4 Gamepad controller working with TK RE and TDM Racial Movement Framework - OAR Not needed but extremely recomended. Rim Parry and Execution Hard Requirement. You must use TDM to Lock on the enemy first to make sure parry and execution work fine Sa'chil - Official Patch-Hub-v2.0.2-CHS 如有安装，则需要 Samurai - Dai Katana 2H Katana Animation (MCO SCAR) SB Eleganto Female Walk Animations Soft Requirement for 360 Walk SGTSAL's Combat Mod List * Simpler Dragon Targeting - True Directional Movement Skyrim Directional Combat Optional but almost required due to having a lock-on system and the mod being designed with it in mind Skys Elden Soul Controls SNS - Scary Night Spawner Optional -> For Boss Health Bars (highly recommended) Souls Controlmap - XBox Series X and Dualshock Controllers Required for Target Lock Sound For TK Dodge SE Optional file need this to work Stance Like U Mean It Necessary. Read REQUIREMENTS section for Important Modifications Sym's Elden Equip TDM DMCO Combo Controller Map The Reason I Made This Mod Target Focus Optional, required only for target-lock The Isometric Scrolls Skyrim - TISS - A Tweak Guide by Sacrossauro Mandatory TK Dodge SE - TDM custom compatible patch True Directional Movement (Chinese Translation) 注意版本 True Directional Movement (PTBR) True Directional Movement (TDM) - German Die Original-Mod wird zwingend benötigt!!! True Directional Movement - Castellano - Spanish True Directional Movement - Colorful Magic SE Boss Bars ini you really need it. why else? True Directional Movement - Diagonal Sprinting Fix True Directional Movement - MCM French Mod VO à installer en premier True Directional Movement - Modernized Third Person Gameplay PT-BR True Directional Movement - Modernized Third Person Gameplay Russian translation True Directional Movement - Spanish True Directional Movement - Tail Animation Fix Optional True Directional Movement - Turkish Translation Ana mod dosyası. True Directional Movement ES para PTBR True Directional Movement Lock-on Fixes Useless without the original mod. TrueHUD - Unslaad Boss Bars ini (old Requirement but highly recommended) TrueHUD - Vigilant Boss Bars ini (old Requirement but highly recommended) UNDERDOG - Animations Mandatory Unofficial Controlmap for me Choose your favorite method of operation in Fomod. Vergil's Sin Devil Trigger not required but works better with it Vergil's Summoned Swords must be version 2.2.5 or higher! Versatile Smoothcam Works also well without it — but was made with it in mind Warrior Style Control Map Water Attack Redo Hard requirements Wingchun - Chinese Kung Fu Animations for MCO Optional but highly recommended. Wintersun - Kynareth Mount Fix Most likely the cause for the issue Witcher Dodge Replacer Not necessary, but highly recommend.
